text: Andrea Cristiano (born 15 July 1984) is an Italian footballer who plays for Italian club Ghivizzano Borgoamozzano.Il GHIVIZZANO chiude con il botto: ecco il centrocampista CRISTIANO‚ toscanagol.it, 2 September 2016 Cristiano extended his contract with AlbinoLeffe to 30 June 2011 in December 2007. On 31 August 2010 he left for fellow Serie B team Ascoli Calcio 1898. On the same day he renewed his contract until 2014. However, on 22 June 2011 Ascoli decided not to sign him outright. On 12 August 2013, Cristiano joined Varese on a two-year deal. ==References== ==External links== * * Category:1984 births Category:Living people Category:Italian footballers Category:Serie B players Category:F.C. title: Andrea Cristiano
